snippet: Royal Ballet’s triple bill of 21st-century ballets by young British choreographers includes Christopher Wheeldon’s “Polyphonia” and two premieres, by Liam Scarlett and Wayne McGregor.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews three ballets, including two world premieres choreographed by Liam Scarlett and Wayne McGregor and a 2001 work by Christopher Wheeldon, performed by the Royal Ballet at the Royal Opera House in Covent Garden, London.
lead_paragraph: Royal Ballet’s triple bill of 21st-century ballets by young British choreographers includes Christopher Wheeldon’s “Polyphonia” and two premieres, by Liam Scarlett and Wayne McGregor.

headline.seo: At Royal Ballet, Debuts by Liam Scarlett and Wayne McGregor
